name: Adventure Gold from Ethereum
description: Bridged from Ethereum via https://bridge.pulsechain.com. Original Address - 0x32353A6C91143bfd6C7d363B546e62a9A2489A20. Adventure Gold is the native ERC-20 token of the Loot non-fungible token (NFT) project. Loot is a text-based, randomized adventure gear generated and stored on-chain, created by social media network Vine co-founder Dom Hofmann.
